name: handle
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: handle
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a part of an object designed for holding, moving, or carrying the object easily

example.eg: I can't pick the kettle up - the handle's too hot.
example.egtrans: 我没法拿起茶壶，壶柄太烫了。

example.eg: She turned the handle and slowly opened the door.
example.egtrans: 她转动把手，慢慢地打开门。

dsense.name: handle
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a name of a person or place, especially a strange one

example.eg: That's some handle to go through life with!
example.egtrans: 一辈子取那样一个名字也够奇怪的！

name: handle
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: handle
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to deal with, have responsibility for, or be in charge of

example.eg: I thought he handled the situation very well.
example.egtrans: 我认为他把局面处理得非常好。

example.eg: Some people are brilliant with computers, but have no idea how to handle (= behave with) other people.
example.egtrans: 有些人在计算机方面很出色，却不会与人打交道。

example.eg: If you can't handle the job I'll get someone else to do it.
example.egtrans: 如果你干不了这项工作，我会让别人来做。

example.eg: Who handles the marketing in your company?
example.egtrans: 你们公司谁负责市场营销？

dsense.name: handle
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to pick something up and touch, hold, or move it with your hands

example.eg: Always wash your hands before handling food.
example.egtrans: 拿食物之前一定要洗手。

example.eg: Please don't handle the vases - they're very fragile.
example.egtrans: 请不要触碰花瓶，它们极易破碎。

dsense.name: handle
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to operate or control something that could be difficult or dangerous
trans_examp.trans_cn: 操作，控制（困难或危险的事物）

example.eg: Have you ever handled a gun before?

trans_examp.trans_en: If a car handles well, it is easy and pleasant to drive.

dsense.name: handle
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: We only handle cosmetics that have not been tested on animals.
example.egtrans: 我们只经营未在动物身上做过试验的化妆品。

example.eg: He's been arrested for handling stolen goods.
